page.title: 18THE VILLAGE FETE
page.content: On Saturday I went to the fete at the lowers. I dressed up as an old fashioned princess with a tall hat with a veil coming down the back. Just before the procession started I was given a collecting box. When the procession started I collected money. I got left behind because I was busy collecting money. When the procession was over I gave my box in. I sat outside the tennis courts and watched the horn dance. It was very good. Some horn dancers had brown horns and the others had white horns.
